synopsis.text: Cap ricious summer days transform into a realm of uncertainty as a group of 36 middle school students, including Nagara, Nozomi, Mizuho, and Asakaze, find themselves and their school transported to an alternate dimension. As they grapple with this new reality, they discover the awakening of supernatural abilities within them. However, the emergence of these powers triggers a wave of discord, as some students, led by the student council, strive for order, while others resist, sparking a rebellion. Amidst the power struggles and the quest for survival, the students must unravel the enigmatic rules of this dimension and find their way back home. As dimensions shift and challenges mount, the students must navigate their newfound abilities and conflicting interests to return to their once tranquil lives.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
